# It appears that I successfully inserted Copper Ore into the Stone Furnace, which is now working and processing the ore into Copper Plates. 
# However, the furnace shows that it has 8 units of Copper Ore remaining, indicating that it may not have accepted all 10 units.

# The furnace is currently producing Copper Plates, and I need to wait for the smelting process to complete.
# I will wait for a maximum of 30 seconds to check if the Copper Plates are produced.

for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)[Prototype.CopperPlate] >= 1:  # Checking for at least 1 Copper Plate.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After waiting, I will check my inventory to confirm the number of Copper Plates produced.
print(f"Inventory after waiting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after waiting for smelting to complete.
